Text: A Pocket Full of Rye:  The book features her detective Miss Marple.

3:

Text: A Pocket Full of Rye:  Like several of Christie's novels (e.g., "Hickory Dickory Dock" and "One, Two, Buckle My Shoe") the title and substantial parts of the plot reference a nursery rhyme, in this case "Sing a Song of Sixpence".
Triplets:<A Pocket Full of Rye
